page.title: 05Education In Dymchurch 2
page.content: Dymchurch Junior School has 188 pupils.There are about 25 in each class.School starts at 9.05 and finishes at 3.30.We have dinner at 12.05: 52% of the children have school dinner,46% bring sandwiches % 2% go home.English & Reading take up 25% of the week,Mathematics 25%,Project Studies,Science and Art & Craft 10% each and R.K. 5%.We have 3 P.E. & a games lesson a week with swimming in the school pool in the Summer.The allowance for each child this year is Â£12.10 with an extra Â£490 for the school.Â£1200 was raised by the P.T.A. & shared between the 2 schools.We have performed 2 musical plays for the parents this year:"The Dainty Pirates" & a play about Christmas customs, both written by teachers.After school clubs include Gymnastics,Drama,Cricket,Foot- ball,Rounders,Choir & Chess.
